ch.cern.dod.util

Class SnapshotHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.cern.dod.util.SnapshotHelper

  • public class SnapshotHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to manage snapshots using web services. It uses the web services implemented in the Syscontrol project
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
